scripts.build: pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter worker build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter web test && pnpm --filter worker test
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter web typecheck && pnpm --filter worker typecheck
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter worker lint
scripts.deploy:pages: pnpm run build:web && wrangler pages deploy web/dist --project-name=sr-prevencion
scripts.deploy:production: pnpm run build && wrangler deploy --env production
